titles.title: Providing for an adjournment of the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/22/2008--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that, when the House adjourns: (1) on Wednesday, January 23, 2008, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Monday, January 28, 2008; and (2) on Tuesday, January 29, 2008, it stand adjourned until 2 p.m. on Wednesday, February 6, 2008.
